wordGroup: gestational diabetes 妊娠（期）糖尿病；孕期糖尿病
juvenile diabetes 青少年糖尿病；幼年型糖尿病
diabetes and cardiovascular disease 糖尿病和心血管疾病

sentences.en: He suffered from diabetes and gastric ulcers.
sentences.cn: 他患有糖尿病和胃溃疡。

sentences.en: My doctor wants me to be tested for diabetes.
sentences.cn: 我的医生要我去做糖尿病检查。

sentences.en: Blindness is a common complication of diabetes.
sentences.cn: 失明是糖尿病常有的一种并发症。
